Package NeuralNet

Class NeuralNetwork

java.lang.Object
NeuralNet.NeuralNetwork
public class NeuralNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
this class create fully connected neural network.
Version:
1.2
Author:
Physic Dev

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    utilities.Matrix[] biais  
    float learningRate
    the amount of modification by train,
    higher value result in learning faster but with less precision

    the standard value of this variable is usualy around 0.01 or 0.001
    utilities.Matrix[] values  
    utilities.Matrix[] weights  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    NeuralNetwork​(int[] structure)
    create a fully connected neural network with multiple hidden layer of neurons.
    the standard activation function are the sigmoid function.
    NeuralNetwork​(int In, int[] Hid, int Out)
    create a fully connected neural network with multiple hidden layer of neurons.
    the standard activation function are the sigmoid function.

    void randomize()
    randomize weight and biais with value between -1 and 1, this methods reset the experience variable because the neuralNetwork is "brainwashed"
    void randomize​(float start, float end)
    randomize weight and biais with value between two values, this methods reset the experience variable because the neuralNetwork is "brainwashed"
    void randomizeLayer​(int layer)
    randomize weight and biais of only one layer with value between -1 and 1.
    This methods didn't reset the experience variable because the neuralNetwork keep a part of its training.

    randomize weight and biais of only one layer with value between two value

    define the activations functions used by the neural network:

    all of the layer will use the first activation function except the output layer which will use the second one

    • learningRate

      public float learningRate
      the amount of modification by train,
      higher value result in learning faster but with less precision

      the standard value of this variable is usualy around 0.01 or 0.001
      Since:
      1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • NeuralNetwork

      public NeuralNetwork​(int In, int[] Hid, int Out) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      create a fully connected neural network with multiple hidden layer of neurons.
      the standard activation function are the sigmoid function.
      Parameters:
      In - the number of inputs
      Hid - array containing the number of neurons for each hidden layer
      the number of hidden layer is given with the array length
      Out - the number of outputs
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one or more values are negative or null
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      NeuralNetwork(int[])

    • NeuralNetwork

      public NeuralNetwork​(int[] structure)
      create a fully connected neural network with multiple hidden layer of neurons.
      the standard activation function are the sigmoid function.
      Parameters:
      structure - array containing the number of neurons for each layer
      the first and the last value of the array are the input and the output,
      the other value correspond to the hidden layers
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one or more values are negative or null
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      NeuralNetwork(int, int[], int)

    • setActivation

      public void setActivation​(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Float,​java.lang.Float> actf, java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Float,​java.lang.Float> derf)
      define the activation function used by the neural network
      Parameters:
      actf - the activation function
      derf - the derivative of the activation function
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      setActivation(functions), setActivation(functions[]), setActivation(Function[], Function[]), setActivation(functions, functions), setActivation(Function, Function, Function, Function)

    • setActivation

      public void setActivation​(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Float,​java.lang.Float> actf, java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Float,​java.lang.Float> derf, java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Float,​java.lang.Float> outActf, java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Float,​java.lang.Float> outDerf)
      define the activations functions used by the neural network:

      all of the layer will use the first activation function except the output layer which will use the second one
      Parameters:
      actf - the first activation function
      derf - the derivative of the first activation function
      outActf - the second activation function
      outDerf - the derivative of the second activation function
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      setActivation(functions), setActivation(functions[]), setActivation(Function[], Function[]), setActivation(functions, functions), setActivation(Function, Function)

    • setActivation

      public void setActivation​(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Float,​java.lang.Float>[] actArray, java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Float,​java.lang.Float>[] derArray) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      define the activations functions used by the neural network. Each layer will have a different activation function
      Parameters:
      actArray - the array of activation function
      derArray - the array of derivative function
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      setActivation(functions), setActivation(functions[]), setActivation(Function, Function, Function, Function), setActivation(functions, functions), setActivation(Function, Function)

    • randomize

      public void randomize​(float start, float end)
      randomize weight and biais with value between two values, this methods reset the experience variable because the neuralNetwork is "brainwashed"
      Parameters:
      start - the minimum value
      end - the maximum value
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      randomize(float, float), randomizeLayer(int), randomizeLayer(int, float, float), XavierInit()

    • randomize

      public void randomize()
      randomize weight and biais with value between -1 and 1, this methods reset the experience variable because the neuralNetwork is "brainwashed"
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      randomize(float, float), randomizeLayer(int), randomizeLayer(int, float, float), XavierInit()

    • XavierInit

      public void XavierInit​(int n)
      randomize weight and biais with the xavier initialisation, this methods reset the experience variable because the neuralNetwork is "brainwashed"
      Parameters:
      n - the parameter of the xavier distribution
      Since:
      1.0, 1.0
      See Also:
      XavierInit(), randomize(), randomize(float, float)

    • XavierInit

      public void XavierInit()
      randomize weight and biais with the xavier initialisation, this methods reset the experience variable because the neuralNetwork is "brainwashed"
      Since:
      1.0, 1.0
      See Also:
      XavierInit(int), randomize(), randomize(float, float)

    • randomizeLayer

      public void randomizeLayer​(int layer)
      randomize weight and biais of only one layer with value between -1 and 1.
      This methods didn't reset the experience variable because the neuralNetwork keep a part of its training.
      Parameters:
      layer - the layer to randomize, input is 0
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundException - if the layer is negative or exceeds number of layer of the neural network.
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      randomize(), randomize(float, float), randomizeLayer(int, float, float), XavierInit()

    • randomizeLayer

      public void randomizeLayer​(int layer, float start, float end) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      randomize weight and biais of only one layer with value between two value.,
      This methods didn't reset the experience variable because the neuralNetwork keep a part of its training.
      Parameters:
      layer - the layer to randomize, input is 0
      start - the minimum value
      end - the maximum value
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundException - if the layer is negative or exceeds number of layer of the neural network.
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      randomize(), randomize(float, float), randomizeLayer(int), XavierInit()

      Throws:

    • backPropagation

      public void backPropagation​(java.lang.Object target) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      compute the backpropagation, change the value of the weights and the biais to get output closer to the target.
      Parameters:
      target - the target values
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the target parameter isn't a matrix or a float array
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the data length doesn't match the neural network output size
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      backPropagation(Object, Object), backPropagation(Object[], Object[]), backPropagation(Object[], Object[], int)

    • backPropagation

      public void backPropagation​(java.lang.Object In, java.lang.Object target)
      assign the inputs to the neural network, compute its output (feedforward) then compute the backpropagation.
      it change the value of the weights and the biais to get output closer to the target.
      Parameters:
      In - the inputs values
      target - the target values
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the In or target parameter isn't a matrix or a float array
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the data length doesn't match the neural network output size
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      backPropagation(Object), backPropagation(Object[], Object[]), backPropagation(Object[], Object[], int)

    • backPropagation

      public void backPropagation​(java.lang.Object[] In, java.lang.Object[] target) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      train the neural network with every values from the database
      Parameters:
      In - the inputs values
      target - the target values
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the In or target parameter isn't a matrix or a float array
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the data length doesn't match the target length
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      backPropagation(Object), backPropagation(Object, Object), backPropagation(Object[], Object[], int)

    • backPropagation

      public void backPropagation​(java.lang.Object[] dataBase, java.lang.Object[] target, int train_number) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      train the neural network X time with random values from the database
      Parameters:
      In - the inputs values
      target - the target values
      train_number - number of trains
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the In or target parameter isn't a matrix or a float array
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the data length doesn't match the target length
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      backPropagation(Object), backPropagation(Object, Object), backPropagation(Object[], Object[], int)

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Return a String containing informations about the neural network.
        informations contain in this representation are :
      • number of inputs
      • number of output
      • complete structure of the neural network
      • experience
      • learningRate
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      the String representation of the neural network
      Since:
      1.0

    • save

      public void save​(java.lang.String path)
      save data in a special file.

      the file contain :

      • a header containing :
        • a begining of file : "NeuralNetworkDataFile :" to indicate the nature of the file
        • the number of input
        • the number of output
        • the number of layer follow by all the layer number of inputs
        • the perceptron experience
      • the weights (and biais) values
      • a end of file "==>" to indicate the file was writed correctly

      Parameters:
      path - of the file
      Since:
      1.0

    • load

      public void load​(java.lang.String path)
      load data from file an addapt the Neural network size to the data
      Parameters:
      path - of the file
      Since:
      1.0

    • strictLoad

      public void strictLoad​(java.lang.String path)

      Parameters:
      path - of the file
      Since:
      1.0
